Warning Fault

Warnings!

The selection of I/P address is only for initial commissioning of the Safe-Weld, and must not be changed during normal operation, which would result in a network failure.
The I/P Address selection can only be made with a single Safe-Weld interfaced to the pendant.

This is the normal I/P address for a single Safe-Weld on a robot controller, or for the first of two Safe-Welds in Dual-gun applications.

Select this I/P address for the second Safe-Weld in Dual-gun applications.
